text: Hello. May I tell you about a phenomenal charity for children?
Hello.What do you thing about children charity.
Save the children is an organization that provides help and relief in developing countries and promotes children's rights. The children deserve a voice!
Really.This sounds good.It is a great job.
They do great work. They need your help with a donation. It will be going to a trustable fund. There are children starving, alone and afraid that need your help today.
How can I donate to them?
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment.
It is an easier way to me for donating them.But still I can't trust.Really it will go to the charity?
The research team will collect all donation and send it to Save the Children. Rest assured it will go to the non-governmental organization and directly to helping the needy children.
I like to donate them 0.10$.
That is wonderful. Every little bit helps us reach our goal of helping millions of children daily. You are now a part of that solution. Could I persuade you to donate more?
Yes.That's why I also help them each and every Cents will help them.I so happy to help to these charity.

Thank you. Look how much the average person spends on junk that is not absolutely needed. EVERY PENNY you donate will help a child in need. It is worth skipping a candy to feed a starving child or remove them from a warzone. Is it not?
May I know where the charity located?
Save the Children is headquartered in the United States with operations out of Connecticut that then disperse funds to the needy.
Fine.Is this an international charity?

Yes, it is. 90% of what is donated goes directly to the children and their needs, while a mere 10% OR LESS is used to fund these life saving operations. Ask yourself, does $2 save YOUR life? It will save a child.
It is a clear details and great.Really they are doing a good job.
Do you want to help the children?
Yes.Because it really bad to live the children without saving it.children's are the gods gift.
How much do you like to donate to the charity now?
